.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite-features__arrows {
    width: 42px;
    height: 42px;
    background-position: 0 0;
}

.sprite-features__cart {
    width: 50px;
    height: 40px;
    background-position: -42px 0;
}

.sprite-features__plane {
    width: 38px;
    height: 38px;
    background-position: -92px 0;
}

.sprite-features__window {
    width: 55px;
    height: 48px;
    background-position: -130px 0;
}
